translated: the nāga lord’s head is nine cubits above the ground,🔽and his tail extends thirteen fingerbreadths beyond the end of the back wall.🔽The nāga’s armpit is four cubits long, with ten fingerbreadths added,

original: khru bzhi yongs su spangs te/ srid du khru gsum gyi tshad dang/ zheng du sor bcu gnyis lhag
analyzed: khru bzhi yongs su spangs te/ srid du khru gsum gyi tshad dang/ zheng du sor bcu gnyis lhag
translated: and two cubits and twelve fingerbreadths wide.

original: pa'i khru'i tshad ni sa bdag klu'i mchan 'og gi cha'o/ /klu de yang dung dang/ kun
analyzed: pa'i khru'i tshad ni sa bdag klu'i mchan 'og gi cha'o/ /klu de yang dung dang/ kun
translated: The measure of the cubit is the span between the thumb and the middle finger of the nāga lord.

original: da dang/ zla da dang/ zla ba'i kha dog lta bu lag pa g-yon pas rang🔽gi mgo'i 'og nas brten pa lag pa g-yas pas rin po che 'dzin cing rang
analyzed: da dang/ zla da dang/ zla ba'i kha dog lta bu lag pa g-yon pas rang gi mgo'i 'og nas brten pa lag pa g-yas pas rin po che 'dzin cing rang
translated: That nāga is like the color of a conch, a kunāda, a candrā, or the moon.🔽With the left hand he supports his head from below.🔽With the right hand he holds a jewel and places it on his waist.

original: gi rked par gzhag pa/ lte ba man chad lag 'gro'i rnam pa can/ de'i steng
analyzed: gi rked par gzhag pa/ lte ba man chad lag 'gro'i rnam pa can/ de'i steng
translated: Below the navel he has the form of a nāga.🔽On top of that is the human form with seven hoods.

original: du @251b mi'i gzugs la gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa ste/ gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i sa gzhi la mngon🔽par khyab cing nyal lo/ /klu brgyad kyi sa bdag klu'i lus la gnas pa ste'o ma'i ro'i nye
analyzed: du @251b mi'i gzugs la gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa ste/ gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i sa gzhi la mngon par khyab cing nyal lo/ /klu brgyad kyi sa bdag klu'i lus la gnas pa ste'o ma'i ro'i nye
translated: He pervades the ground of the temple and so on and sleeps.🔽The eight nāgas are located in the body of the nāga lord.🔽He should be worshipped with the enjoyment of the taste of mother’s milk.

original: bar spyad pas mchod par bya'o/ /de la mjug ma'i rtse mo la rigs ldan sku mdog sngon po'o/
analyzed: bar spyad pas mchod par bya'o/ /de la mjug ma'i rtse mo la rigs ldan sku mdog sngon po'o/
translated: On the tip of the tail is the blue-colored Kṛiṣṇanāga.

original: / gsang gnas la stobs kyi rgyu sngo bsangs d'ur ba'i kha dog go/ /lte ba la dung skyong padma'i
analyzed: / gsang gnas la stobs kyi rgyu sngo bsangs d'ur ba'i kha dog go/ /lte ba la dung skyong padma'i
translated: At the secret place is Balabhadra, the color of a blue water lily.🔽At the navel is Śaṅkhapāla, the color of a lotus.

original: sdong po'i mdog go/ /dbung pa'i phyogs la padma chen po mching bu'i mdog go/ /snying gar nor
analyzed: sdong po'i mdog go/ /dbung pa'i phyogs la padma chen po mching bu'i mdog go/ /snying gar nor
translated: The color of the trunk is that of a great lotus.🔽On the right arm is a great lotus the color of lapis lazuli.🔽On the heart is a blue lotus the color of a peacock’s neck.

original: rgyas sngo bsangs d'ur ba'i mdog go/ /mgul pa la 'jog po dmar po'o/ /rna ba la padma
analyzed: rgyas sngo bsangs d'ur ba'i mdog go/ /mgul pa la 'jog po dmar po'o/ /rna ba la padma
translated: On the throat is red Anavatapta.🔽On the ear is a white lotus.

original: dkar po'o; /spyi gtsug na klu dga' bo sngon po'o/ /de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i
analyzed: dkar po'o; /spyi gtsug na klu dga' bo sngon po'o/ /de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i
translated: On the crown of the head is the blue nāga Nanda.🔽In the same way, one should meditate on the essence of the earth lords as the essence of the body of Vairocana.

original: ngo bor sa bdag bsgom par bya'o/ /aom a'a: ba ru n'a ya h'um sv'a h'a/ aom
analyzed: ngo bor sa bdag bsgom par bya'o/ /aom a'a: ba ru n'a ya h'um sv'a h'a/ aom
translated: Oṃ āḥ to Varuṇa hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ āḥ to Kulika hūṃ svāhā.

original: a'a: ku li k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a/ aom a'a: ka rko ta k'a ya h'um sv'a
analyzed: a'a: ku li k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a/ aom a'a: ka rko ta k'a ya h'um sv'a
translated: Oṃ āḥ to Karṇotaka hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ āḥ to Śaṅkhapāla hūṃ svāhā.

original: h'a/ aom a'a: sham kha p'a l'a ya h'um sv'a h'a/ aom a'a: ma h'a padm'a ya
analyzed: h'a/ aom a'a: sham kha p'a l'a ya h'um sv'a h'a/ aom a'a: ma h'a padm'a ya
translated: Oṃ āḥ to Mahāpadma hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ āḥ to Vāsuki hūṃ svāhā.

original: h'um sv'a h'a; aom a'a: b'a su ka ya h'um sv'a h'a/ aom a'a: ta ksha k'a ya
analyzed: h'um sv'a h'a; aom a'a: b'a su ka ya h'um sv'a h'a/ aom a'a: ta ksha k'a ya
translated: Oṃ āḥ to Takṣaka hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ āḥ to Padma hūṃ svāhā.

original: h'um sv'a h'a/ aom a'a: padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a/ aom a'a: aa na nt'a ya
analyzed: h'um sv'a h'a/ aom a'a: padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a/ aom a'a: aa na nt'a ya
translated: Oṃ āḥ to Ananta hūṃ svāhā.

original: h'um sv'a h'a/ zhes pa ni mchod pa'i sngags so/ /de nas thams cad du sa🔽gzhi'i 'og gi lha rnams dang/ /sa'i lha rnams sngon du 'gro bas/ yid kyis bteg
analyzed: h'um sv'a h'a/ zhes pa ni mchod pa'i sngags so/ /de nas thams cad du sa gzhi'i 'og gi lha rnams dang/ /sa'i lha rnams sngon du 'gro bas/ yid kyis bteg
translated: This is the mantra for the offerings.🔽Then, with the mantra of the earth goddess,🔽one should mentally lift up the ground and place it in the sky.

original: nas nam mkha' la dgod par bya'o/ /de la zug rdu dang nyes pa yongs su gzhom pa'i phyir
analyzed: nas nam mkha' la dgod par bya'o/ /de la zug rdu dang nyes pa yongs su gzhom pa'i phyir
translated: In order to completely destroy the faults and obstacles,

original: sa'i cha la mtshams yang yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /de la mtshams ni rnam pa
analyzed: sa'i cha la mtshams yang yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /de la mtshams ni rnam pa
translated: one should examine the ground for boundaries.🔽There are five kinds of boundaries:

original: lnga ste/ mtshams dang/ nye ba'i mtshams dang/ /las kyi mtshams dang/ tshul lugs kyi mtshams
analyzed: lnga ste/ mtshams dang/ nye ba'i mtshams dang/ /las kyi mtshams dang/ tshul lugs kyi mtshams
translated: the boundary, the sub-boundary, the activity boundary,🔽the boundary of the system,🔽and the directional boundary.🔽There are eighteen boundaries,

original: dang/ phyogs kyi mtshams zhes so/ /de la re mi ga drug cu rtsa bzhir bya bde bzhin du mtshams ni
analyzed: dang/ phyogs kyi mtshams zhes so/ /de la re mi ga drug cu rtsa bzhir bya bde bzhin du mtshams ni
translated: like the sixty-four squares of a chessboard:🔽two central boundaries,

original: bco brgyad du rig par bya ste/ dbus kyi mtshams gnyis dang/ de dag gi gzhogs gnyis su nye
analyzed: bco brgyad du rig par bya ste/ dbus kyi mtshams gnyis dang/ de dag gi gzhogs gnyis su nye
translated: four sub-boundaries on the two sides of those,🔽four activity boundaries outside of those,

original: ba'i mtshams bzhi dang de'i phyi rol tu las kyi mtshams bzhi dang/ de'i phyi rol du lugs kyi
analyzed: ba'i mtshams bzhi dang de'i phyi rol tu las kyi mtshams bzhi dang/ de'i phyi rol du lugs kyi
translated: and outside of those, four boundaries of the system.

original: mtshams bzhi dang/ de bzhin du thams cad kyi phyi rol tu phyogs kyi mtshams bzhi'o/ /dbus
analyzed: mtshams bzhi dang/ de bzhin du thams cad kyi phyi rol tu phyogs kyi mtshams bzhi'o/ /dbus
translated: In the four intermediate directions, and likewise in the four intermediate directions outside of all of them,

original: kyi mtshams la brkos na bu la sogs pa nyams par 'gyur ro/ /nye ba'i mtshams
analyzed: kyi mtshams la brkos na bu la sogs pa nyams par 'gyur ro/ /nye ba'i mtshams
translated: if one digs in the central intermediate direction, one’s children and so forth will be destroyed.🔽If one digs in the intermediate direction of the neighbors, the country will be destroyed.

original: la ni yul stongs par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi mtshams la ni phra mo'i nyes pa'o/
analyzed: la ni yul stongs par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi mtshams la ni phra mo'i nyes pa'o/
translated: If one digs in the intermediate direction of karma, there will be minor faults.🔽If one digs in the intermediate direction of the tradition, the patron will die.

original: /lugs @252a */ /kyi mtshams la ni sbyin bdag 'chi'o/ /phyogs kyi mtshams la ni yo byad nyams pa
analyzed: /lugs @252a */ /kyi mtshams la ni sbyin bdag 'chi'o/ /phyogs kyi mtshams la ni yo byad nyams pa
translated: If one digs in the intermediate direction of the quarters, one’s provisions will be destroyed

original: dang dbul por 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir mtshams rnams la brko bar mi bya'o/ /de la
analyzed: dang dbul por 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir mtshams rnams la brko bar mi bya'o/ /de la
translated: and one will become poor. Therefore, one should not dig in the intermediate directions.

original: shar phyogs su glang gi khyim gyi rang bzhin la phyogs dang lugs dang las kyi🔽mtshams dang/ lugs kyi mtshams la gnas pa'i rig ma gzugs can ma kha dog dkar mo chos kyi
analyzed: shar phyogs su glang gi khyim gyi rang bzhin la phyogs dang lugs dang las kyi mtshams dang/ lugs kyi mtshams la gnas pa'i rig ma gzugs can ma kha dog dkar mo chos kyi
translated: In the east, the nature of the house of Taurus is the intermediate direction of the quarters, the intermediate direction of the tradition, the intermediate direction of karma,🔽and the intermediate direction of the tradition. One should make an offering to the knowledge-woman who resides there, white in color,🔽in the form of a dharma-mudra, standing on a lotus and moon,

original: phyag rgya'i tshul du byas pa padma dang/ zla ba'i steng du gnas pa mchod pa bya'o/ /aom
analyzed: phyag rgya'i tshul du byas pa padma dang/ zla ba'i steng du gnas pa mchod pa bya'o/ /aom
translated: with the syllable oṃ.

original: badzra ru pi ni ye aa sv'a h'a/ de nas 'khrig pa'i khyim gyi rang bzhin la nye🔽ba'i mtshams dang dbus kyi mtshams dang nye ba'i mtshams rnams kyis dbus kyi mtshams la gnas pa'i rig ma 'od🔽byed ma sku mdog dkar mo mchod par bya'o/ /aom badzra bh'a sk'a ri yee a'a sv'a h'a/ lhag

translated: Vajra Rupiniye asvaha.

analyzed: kyi mtshams la gnas pa'i rig ma rdo rje sgeg mo sku mdog ser mo mchod par bya'o/ /aom badzra
translated: The knowledge-woman who abides in the middle of the middle of the middle of the house of Virgo is called Vajra-Lāsyā. She is yellow in color and should be worshipped.

original: b'i l'a sa ni yee ai sv'a h'a/ lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin no/ /de nas bu mo'i
analyzed: b'i l'a sa ni yee ai sv'a h'a/ lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin no/ /de nas bu mo'i
translated: Oṃ vajra-lāsye i svāhā. The rest is the same as before.

analyzed: khyim gyi rang bzhin la nye ba'i mtshams dang dbus kyi mtshams dang nye ba'i mtshams rnams kyi dbus kyi mtshams la gnas pa'i rig ma rdo rje rmongs byed ma zhes pa cung zad sku mdog ser mo mchod

analyzed: par bya'o/ /aom badzra mo ha ni yee au sv'a h'a/ lhag ma ni sngo ma bzhin no/ /de'i
translated: Oṃ vajra-mohani u svāhā. The rest is the same as before.

original: rjes su srang gi khyim gyi rang bzhin la las dang lugs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams kyi lugs
analyzed: rjes su srang gi khyim gyi rang bzhin la las dang lugs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams kyi lugs
translated: After that, in the house of Scorpio, in the middle of the middle of the middle of the middle of the house,

original: kyi mtshams la gnas pa'i rig ma rdo rje mkha' spyod ma zhes pa nam mkha'i mdog can mchod par
analyzed: kyi mtshams la gnas pa'i rig ma rdo rje mkha' spyod ma zhes pa nam mkha'i mdog can mchod par
translated: the knowledge-woman who abides in the middle of the middle of the middle of the middle is called Vajra-Khecarī. She is the color of space and should be worshipped.

original: bya'o/ /aom badzra khe tsa ri yee a'u sv'a h'a/ lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin no/ /de bzhin
analyzed: bya'o/ /aom badzra khe tsa ri yee a'u sv'a h'a/ lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin no/ /de bzhin
translated: Oṃ vajra kṣetriyai ū svahā. The rest is the same as before.

original: du nub phyogs su sdig pa'i khyim gyi rang bzhin la phyogs dang lugs dang las kyi mtshams
analyzed: du nub phyogs su sdig pa'i khyim gyi rang bzhin la phyogs dang lugs dang las kyi mtshams
translated: In the same way, in the west, in the house of Virgo, in the directions, the system, and the boundary of the karma,

original: @252b rnams kyi lugs kyi mtshams la gnas pa'i rig ma rdo rje gnam lcags ma sku mdog dmar mo
analyzed: @252b rnams kyi lugs kyi mtshams la gnas pa'i rig ma rdo rje gnam lcags ma sku mdog dmar mo
translated: in the system of the boundary, the knowledge-woman Vajra Lightning, red in color,🔽should be worshipped.

original: mchod par bya'o/ /aom badzra sa ni yee ae sv'a h'a/ lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin no/
analyzed: mchod par bya'o/ /aom badzra sa ni yee ae sv'a h'a/ lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin no/
translated: Oṃ vajra sanīye ai svahā. The rest is the same as before.

original: /de na gzhu'i khyim gyi rang bzhin la nye ba'i mtshams dang dbus kyi mtshams dang nye ba'i
analyzed: /de na gzhu'i khyim gyi rang bzhin la nye ba'i mtshams dang dbus kyi mtshams dang nye ba'i
translated: There, in the house of Sagittarius, in the boundary of the near boundary, the boundary of the central boundary, and the boundary of the near boundary,

original: mtshams rnams kyi mtshams la gnas pa'i rig ma rdo rje ro ma zhes sku mdog dmar mo mchod par bya'o/
analyzed: mtshams rnams kyi mtshams la gnas pa'i rig ma rdo rje ro ma zhes sku mdog dmar mo mchod par bya'o/
translated: the knowledge-woman Vajra Taste, red in color, should be worshipped.

original: /aom badzra ra sa n'a yee aee sv'a h'a/ lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i rjes su
analyzed: /aom badzra ra sa n'a yee aee sv'a h'a/ lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i rjes su
translated: Oṃ vajra rasāye ai svahā. The rest is the same as before.🔽After that,

original: chu srin gyi khyim gyi rang bzhin la las dang lugs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams kyi lugs kyi
analyzed: chu srin gyi khyim gyi rang bzhin la las dang lugs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams kyi lugs kyi
translated: In the sign of the house of Makara, in the directions, the cardinal directions, and the intermediate directions,

original: mtshams la gnas pa'i rig ma rdo rje skrag byed ma zhes pa kha dag sngon mo mchod par bya'o/ /aom badzra
analyzed: mtshams la gnas pa'i rig ma rdo rje skrag byed ma zhes pa kha dag sngon mo mchod par bya'o/ /aom badzra
translated: one should worship the knowledge-woman Vajra-Trikaya, blue in color, in the intermediate directions of the system.🔽Om Vajra-Trikaya-ye Svaha. The rest is as before.

original: tr'a sa ni yee aom sv'a h'a/ lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin du'o/ /de bzhin du byang phyogs su
analyzed: tr'a sa ni yee aom sv'a h'a/ lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin du'o/ /de bzhin du byang phyogs su
translated: In the same way, in the north,

original: bum pa'i khyim gyi rang bzhin la phyogs dang lugs dang las kyi mtshams rnams kyi lugs kyi mtshams
analyzed: bum pa'i khyim gyi rang bzhin la phyogs dang lugs dang las kyi mtshams rnams kyi lugs kyi mtshams
translated: in the sign of the house of Kumbha, in the directions, the cardinal directions, and the intermediate directions,

original: rnams la gnas pa'i rig ma reg bya rdo rje ma zhes pa sku mdog ljang gu mchod par bya'o/
analyzed: rnams la gnas pa'i rig ma reg bya rdo rje ma zhes pa sku mdog ljang gu mchod par bya'o/
translated: one should worship the knowledge-woman Sparsha-Vajra, green in color, in the intermediate directions of the system.

original: /aom badzra sparsha n'i yee aoo sv'a h'a/ lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas nya'i khyim
analyzed: /aom badzra sparsha n'i yee aoo sv'a h'a/ lhag ma ni sngon ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas nya'i khyim
translated: Om Vajra-Sparsha-naye Oum Svaha. The rest is as before.

original: gyi rang bzhin la nye ba'i mtshams dang dbus kyi mtshams dang nye ba'i mtshams kyi dbus kyi mtshams
analyzed: gyi rang bzhin la nye ba'i mtshams dang dbus kyi mtshams dang nye ba'i mtshams kyi dbus kyi mtshams
translated: Then, in the sign of the house of Mina, in the intermediate directions, in the middle directions, and in the middle of the intermediate directions,

original: la gnas pa'i rig ma sems rdo rje ma zhes pa d'ur ba'i mdog can mchod par bya'o/ /aom
analyzed: la gnas pa'i rig ma sems rdo rje ma zhes pa d'ur ba'i mdog can mchod par bya'o/ /aom
translated: After that, one should visualize the house of Gemini, which is of the nature of action, and the knowledge woman who resides in the cardinal and intermediate directions of the house of Gemini, called Vajra-karma, who is of the color of a lotus.🔽Om vajra-karma-kṛte hūṃ svāhā.
